alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 16 at 6:35PM AKST until February 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow reducing visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected late tonight and early Friday. Winds will decrease Friday evening and visibility will improve then.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
